Title: Relates to standards of proof for establishing that a student has a disability in the university of the state of New York or the city university of New York system
Summary: Relates to standards of proof for establishing that a student has a disability in the university of the state of New York or the city university of New York system including accepting documents as proof of a students' disability.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to standards of proof for the purposes of establishing a student has a disability in the university of the state of New York or the city university of New York system
